title: How to manage your investments during a pandemic or any market downturn
description: Leslie Cliff: Fear is the enemy; be self-aware enough to realize that you make terrible investing decisions when you are afraid of the market
content:
There are rules of thumbs that apply to managing investments during a downturn. However, not all downturns are the same.
